title: Unidentified drones spotted over bases used by U.S. Air Force in Britain
description: The drones were detected last week over three bases in eastern England, the Air Force said.
author: Kelsey Baker
excerpt: The drones were detected last week over three bases in eastern England, the Air Force said.
text: Multiple unidentified drones were seen last week near three British air bases used by American forces, the U.S. Air Force said in a statement Monday.The drones were detected between Wednesday and Sunday, near Royal Air Force Lakenheath, Royal Air Force Mildenhall and Royal Air Force Feltwell, all three of which are in eastern England. The bases house thousands of U.S. service members, primarily Air Force personnel.
html:
Multiple unidentified drones were seen last week near three British air bases used by American forces, the U.S. Air Force said in a statement Monday.

The drones were detected between Wednesday and Sunday, near Royal Air Force Lakenheath, Royal Air Force Mildenhall and Royal Air Force Feltwell, all three of which are in eastern England. The bases house thousands of U.S. service members, primarily Air Force personnel.
